name: Replica_TestDemo
description:
It's a test-demo of a puzzle game i'm making. I would really appreciate if you took a moment to play it and tell me how difficult you found each level or any other suggestions you might have.

GAMEPLAY

You must separate two shapes made out of blocks.

TECHNICAL

The download is a RAR file. You can use WinRAR or 7zip to extract it.

The game was packaged for Windows only.

There is no sound in the game yet.
